table.name: gtm_tl_additional_info
table.description: the table stores addition infos that added against declaration line

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM declaration line.

columns.name: GTM_ADDITIONAL_INFO_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM additional information.

columns.name: TEXT_OVERRIDE
columns.description: Text specified in this field will override the default text defined in the GTM additional information.

columns.name: EXPORT_FROM
columns.description: Country or region from which the goods are being exported.
